sentences.sentence: The miniaturisation of the components of computer chips has proved unstoppable.
sentences.translation: 事实证明，计算机芯片元件的微型化已经势不可挡。

sentences.sentence: The key, it turned out, lay in the miniaturisation and automation of analytical tools.
sentences.translation: 而关键在于微缩技术与分析工具的自动化程度。

sentences.sentence: The project will also benefit from miniaturisation to make the helmet wearable on the move.
sentences.translation: 这个项目也会为得益于微电子技术使头盔更易于佩戴在动的人身上。
